column1: Table 5.16: Total Cost Estimate for Stream Reservation Proposals

column3: Soil erosion of land on both sides(200m). Recommend 1. Construct (2mx2mx1m) one SABO- boulder dams across the stream where canal is steep. 2. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Areca nut trees /Kithul/Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.4. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 150 m2.

Soil erosion of land on both sides(800m). Recommend 1. Construct (2mx2mx1m) three SABO- boulder dams across the stream where canal is steep. 2. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Areca nut trees /Kithul/Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.4. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 400 m2.

Soil erosion of land on both sides(over 9km length). Recommend 1. Construct (2mx2mx1m) ten SABO- boulder dams across the stream locations where canal is steep. 2. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Areca nut trees /Kithul/ Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna /Mango/local fruits/randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.4. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 2500 m2 including catchment of the tank.

Soil erosion of embankments (about 1.5km length). Recommend for both sides to plant single row of Areca nut seedling @ 1m spacing and gaps filled with Vetiver grass and maintain for 3 months until roots are established.
